examples.example: 每次提到那段美好的回忆，我都会情不自禁地露出笑容。

translate.english: Every time I mention that beautiful memory, I can't help but show a smile.

examples.example: 每当别人提到他的成功经历，他总是谦虚地微笑着。

translate.english: Whenever others mention his successful experience, he always smiles modestly.

examples.example: 每当提到未来的规划，他总是充满信心和期待。

translate.english: Whenever it comes to the future plan, he is always full of confidence and expectation.
